law.catch_line: Eligibility of industrial hemp growers to receive tobacco settlement funds under Master Settlement Agreement.
law.text: Industrial hemp growers licensed under KRS 260.850 to 260.869 may be eligible to receive funds received by the state under the Master Settlement Agreement and placed in the rural development fund established in KRS 248.655.
law.history: Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 134, sec. 14, effective June 25, 2013.
